Requirements/ Policies

  • depends on boost

Each module has its own namespace - the module name itself.

  • all libs dropped in the lib/ namespace
  • for VS - automatic pragma lib comment

Compilers

Targetted at VS2005/VS2008. However it should work on VS2003 / gcc 4.1.
